com.elsevier.spark_xml_utils.xslt

Class S3URIResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elsevier.spark_xml_utils.xslt.S3URIResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.xml.transform.URIResolver

    public class S3URIResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.xml.transform.URIResolver
    URI Resolver that will be used by XLTProcessor when resolving xsl:import and xsl:include statements. The purpose of this class is to create a local cache of the stylesheets retrieved (presumably) from S3 so they don't need to be re-retrieved from S3 on subsequent requests.
    Author:
    Darin McBeath

      • S3URIResolver

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        public javax.xml.transform.Source resolve(java.lang.String href,
                                 java.lang.String base)
                                   throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Return the requested stylesheet. If the stylesheet hasn't been cached, then save the stylesheet to the cache. The assumption (although not required) is that the imported/included stylesheets will be stored in an S3 bucket and accessible using an S3 url.
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface javax.xml.transform.URIResolver
        Parameters:
        href - url for the stylesheet
        base - not used (assuming absolute urls)
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
